info.name: AMMS Complete API Collection
info.description: Unified AMMS collection combining all module collections. Supports EN/AR via Lang header.

item.name: Admin
item.description: Admin-scoped endpoints

item.name: Activity (Audit Log) API
item.description: Read-only activity log endpoints for auditing system actions. Activities are created automatically via the LogsActivity trait and cannot be modified or deleted via API. (Supports EN/AR via Lang header)

item.name: Admin - Activity Endpoints

query.description: Filter by action (created, updated, deleted, etc.)

request.description: Get all activity logs in the system. Admin can view all activities.
Get a single activity record by ID

query.description: Number of days to calculate statistics for

request.description: Get activity statistics (total activities, by action, by user type, etc.)

query.description: Number of days to look back

request.description: Get recent activity logs (last X days)
Get all activity logs for a specific entity (e.g., all changes to Supplier #1)
Get all activity logs performed by a specific user

item.description: Admin endpoints - full system access to all activity logs

item.name: Admin Management API
item.description: Admin user management endpoints (CRUD operations, profile, password management) (Supports EN/AR via Lang header)

item.name: Authentication

exec: // Set the access_token in the environment variable if it exists

request.description:
Login as admin user. Returns authentication token.

**Token Expiration:**
- remember_me = false: Token expires in 1 hour (default)
- remember_me = true: Token expires in 30 days

**Response includes:**
- admin (user data)
- token (Bearer token for Authorization header)
- expires_at (expiration timestamp)
- remember_me (boolean)

response.name: Success (Remember Me OFF - 1 hour)
Success (Remember Me ON - 30 days)
Error (Invalid Credentials)

request.description: Get authenticated admin user details with roles and permissions (includes profile fields).

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "status": true,
  "message": "Retrieved successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Admin User",
    "email": "admin@amms.com",
    "email_verified": true,
    "status": "active",
    "role": "Admin",
    "role_slug": "admin",
    "mobile": "+201234567890",
    "nationality": "EG",
    "job_title": "Head of IT",
    "department": "IT",
    "company_unit": "HQ",
    "employee_id": "EMP-0001",
    "profile_photo": null,
    "created_by": null,
    "created_at": "2025-10-30T10:12:00Z",
    "updated_at": "2025-10-30T10:12:00Z",
    "created_by_name": null,
    "creator_info": null,
    "roles": [
      {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "admin",
        "display_name": "Admin",
        "role_type": "admin"
      }
    ],
    "permissions": [
      {
        "id": 10,
        "name": "admin.admins.index",
        "display_name": "List Admins",
        "context": "admin"
      }
    ]
  }
}

request.description: Logout admin user and revoke current access token

Get non-paginated list of all admins
Get non-paginated list of all suppliers

request.description: Get non-paginated list of all supplier accounts
Get admin statistics (total, by status, etc.)
Get single admin by ID with roles and permissions. Returns profile fields and aggregated permissions (read-only).

request.description: Create a new admin user
Update admin details (includes profile fields)
Delete (soft delete) an admin
Update admin status (active/inactive)
Update admin role
Change admin password (requires current password)
Generate a strong password that meets policy requirements (8-20 chars, uppercase, lowercase, number, special character). Returns password only - does NOT set it for any user.

Reset admin password (admin only, no current password required).

**Password Policy:**
- 8-20 characters
- At least 1 uppercase letter
- At least 1 lowercase letter
- At least 1 number
- At least 1 special character (@$!%*?&)

**force_password_change (optional, default: true):**
- true: User must change password on next login
- false: User can use the new password immediately

item.name: Admin - BD Management API
item.description: BD management endpoints accessible by admin users (Supports EN/AR via Lang header)

request.description: Get paginated list of all BDs
Get BD statistics (total, active, inactive, suspended). **OPTIMIZED:** Uses single GROUP BY query (4 queries  1 query, 75% reduction). Response time improved by 60-80% with large datasets.
Get single BD by ID
Create a new BD user
Update BD details
Delete (soft delete) a BD user
Update BD status (active/inactive)

item.name: Admin - Supplier Management API
item.description: Supplier management endpoints accessible by admin users (Supports EN/AR via Lang header)

request.description: Get paginated list of all suppliers
Get supplier statistics (total, by status, etc.)
Get single supplier by ID with admin account details
Create a new supplier with an admin account
Update supplier details
Delete (soft delete) a supplier

item.name: Authentication API
item.description: Authentication endpoints for Admin, Supplier, and BD user types (Supports EN/AR via Lang header)

item.name: Admin Authentication

request.description:
Login as admin user. Returns authentication token.

**Token Expiration:**
- remember_me = false: Token expires in 1 hour
- remember_me = true: Token expires in 30 days

**Response includes:**
- admin (user data)
- token (Bearer token)
- expires_at (expiration timestamp)
- remember_me (boolean)

response.name: Success Response (Remember Me OFF)
Success Response (Remember Me ON)
Error Response (Invalid Credentials)

request.description: Get authenticated admin user details
Logout admin user and revoke token

item.description: Admin authentication endpoints

item.name: Folders Module
item.description: Complete API collection for the AMMS Folders Module covering Admin and Supplier user types

query.description: Optional: Filter by parent folder ID (null for root folders)

formdata.description: Required: Project ID
Optional: Parent folder ID (null for root folder)
Optional: Folder photo (jpeg, jpg, png, webp, max 5MB)
Optional: Change parent folder
Optional: New folder photo (jpeg, jpg, png, webp, max 5MB). Old photo will be replaced.

request.description: Update folder details. Uses POST method with form-data to support photo uploads.
Lock folder - only this admin can see it
Unlock folder - all authorized users can see it (only the admin who locked it can unlock)

formdata.description: Optional custom name
Required file (images, documents, video, pdf, archives up to 50MB)

item.name: Permissions API
item.description: Permission management endpoints - READ-ONLY (Permissions managed via seeders) (Supports EN/AR via Lang header)

item.name: READ-ONLY Endpoints

request.description: Get all permissions (Admin sees all, Supplier sees only supplier context)
Get a single permission by ID

item.description: Only GET requests are available. Permissions are managed via database seeders.

item.name: DISABLED Endpoints (For Reference)

request.description: DISABLED - This endpoint is not available. Permissions are managed via seeders only. This request will return 404.
DISABLED - This endpoint is not available. Permissions are managed via seeders only. This request will return 404.
DISABLED - This endpoint is not available. Permissions are managed via seeders only. This request will return 404.

item.description: These endpoints are disabled. Kept here for documentation purposes only.

item.name: Projects Module
item.description: Complete API collection for the AMMS Projects Module covering Admin and Supplier user types

formdata.description: Optional: Assign supplier to project
Optional: assign a sub-admin by user ID
Repeat the field to assign multiple sub-admins
Optional: assign supplier user (used when authenticated user is supplier admin)
Optional: Change assigned supplier
Optional: replace sub-admin assignments (omit field to keep current)

request.description: Returns all supplier accounts with supplier_admin role for admin project creation

item.name: Roles API
item.description: Role management endpoints - Auto-generates slug from display_name (Supports EN/AR via Lang header)

query.description: Filter by role type (admin, supplier, bd)

request.description: Get paginated list of roles with optional filters
Get a single role by ID with optional relations
Create a role with just display_name. The 'name' (slug) will be auto-generated as 'sales-manager'
Create a role with permissions. Slug auto-generated as 'customer-support-team'
Full example. Slug auto-generated as 'hr-admin-manager'
Update role display name. Slug will be regenerated as 'senior-sales-manager'
Deactivate role. Slug remains unchanged.
Update display name and status. Slug regenerated as 'executive-sales-manager'
Soft delete a role
Get all permissions assigned to a role
Attach additional permissions to role (keeps existing)
Replace all permissions with new set (removes unlisted permissions)
Remove a specific permission from role
Get all users assigned to this role (paginated)

item.description: API collection for managing folder files and links in the AMMS platform. Supports both folder-level and project-level items (use folder_id OR project_id, not both).

Optional filter: pending, approved, needs_fix, rejected

Optional display name
Optional initial status
Target project ID (use folder_id OR project_id, not both)
Optional display name
Optional initial status

request.description: Use folder_id OR project_id (not both)
Use folder_id OR project_id (not both)

item.name: Supplier Roles API
item.description: Supplier-specific role management - Auto-generates slug from display_name. Includes endpoint to get available permissions for role creation. (Supports EN/AR via Lang header)

request.description: Get all available permissions that suppliers can assign to roles. Returns permissions with context='supplier' only. Use this to get permission IDs for role creation.
Get paginated list of supplier roles (role_type='supplier' only)
Get a single supplier role by ID with optional relations
Create a supplier role with just display_name. The 'name' (slug) will be auto-generated as 'warehouse-manager'

Create supplier role with permissions. Slug auto-generated as 'inventory-specialist'. Role type automatically set to 'supplier'. Permission IDs: 101=View Own Projects, 103=View Project Details, 104=Update Own Projects, 105=Delete Own Projects
Update role display name. Slug will be regenerated as 'senior-warehouse-manager'
Deactivate role. Slug remains unchanged.
Soft delete a supplier role
Get all permissions assigned to this supplier role (context='supplier' only)
Attach additional permissions to role (keeps existing permissions). Permission IDs: 106=Archive Own Projects, 107=Unarchive Own Projects, 108=View Project Statistics
Replace all permissions with new set (removes unlisted permissions). Permission IDs: 101=View Own Projects, 103=View Project Details
Remove a specific permission from supplier role
Get all supplier accounts assigned to this role (paginated)

item.description: BD user authentication endpoints with token expiration and multilingual support

request.description: Login as BD user. Token expires in 1 hour without remember_me, 30 days with remember_me=true
Login as BD user with Arabic response messages
Login with extended session (30 days). Token will not expire after 1 hour of inactivity.
Get authenticated BD details. Use this endpoint to extend session (resets inactivity timer).
Logout BD user. Only revokes the current device token.
